entry.title: mysql
entry.content:
一、数据库储存引擎

  1. 数据库的储存引擎是一种机制，规定了应用如何存储引用数据。Mysql5.5之前默认的存储引擎是MyISAM，之后是InnoDB.

  2. MyISAM和InnoDB

    MyISAM

    • 采用表锁
    • B树索引和全文索引
    • MyISAM表在磁盘的存储文件
      • .frm 表结构文件
      • .MYD MYDATA 表的数据文件
      • .MYI MYIndex 表的索引文件

    InnoDB

    • 采用行锁
    • 支持事务和外键
    • B树索引和集群索引

二、索引

  1. 索引的本质是一个数据结构。

  2. Mysql的索引结构

    • B树索引

      B-Tree

      B+Tree

    • hash索引

    • 全局索引

    • 集群索引

  3. 联合索引

  4. MyISAM和InnoDB的索引结构

    1. MyISAM

      • MyISAM存储引擎的索引结构

        MyISAM表的索引文件的key为索引列的数据，value为每个数据代表的行的磁盘地址

    2. InnoDB

      • InnoDB存储引擎的索引结构

        InnoDB表的索引结构key为索引列的数据，每个key代表的整个行的数据也存储在索引表中。

三、数据库事务

四、WAL

五、MVCC

六、数据库工具

  1. explain

entry.title: 红黑树
entry.content:
一、树概述

有关树的常用术语

  • 节点：每个储存数据的圆圈都是节点；
  • 节点的路径：从根节点到本节点经历的节点和分支的顺序排序。
  • 路径的长度：指节点的路径包含的分支数，即边数。
  • 节点的度：指该节点拥有的子树的个数；
  • 树的度：所有的节点的度中，最大值。
  • 叶节点：即终端节点。
  • 分支节点：树中除了叶节点之外的节点都是分支节点。
  • 子节点：指该节点的子树的根节点。
  • 父节点：拥有子树的节点。
  • 节点的层次：根节点的层次为0，依次向下加一；
  • 树的深度：节点的层数；

二、二叉树

前：8 3 1 6 4 7 10 14 13中：1 3 4 6 7 8 10 13 14后：1 4 7 6 3 13 14 10 8二叉树节点：public class TreeNode {    private Object data;    private TreeNode left;    private TreeNode right;Constructor 构造方法Setter and Getter  }二叉树递归遍历： 前：public static void pre(TreeNode t){        if(t!=null){            System.out.println(t.getData());            pre(t.getLeft());            pre(t.getRight());        }     }   中：public static void in(TreeNode t){        if(t!=null){            in(t.getLeft());            System.out.println(t .getData());            in(t.getRight());        }     }   后：public static void post(TreeNode t){        if(t!=null){            post(t.getLeft());            post(t.getRight());            System.out.println(t.getData());        }     }二叉查找树左子树的值均小于根节点的值，右子树的值均大于根节点的值。且每个子树均是二叉查找树。二叉平衡树在二叉查找树的基础上，通过对数据的调整，达到数据平衡的效果。   二叉查找树(二叉排序树)public class Tree {    private TreeNode root;    public Tree(TreeNode root) {        this.root = root;    }    public Tree() {    }    public TreeNode getRoot() {        return root;    }    public void setRoot(TreeNode root) {        this.root = root;    }    public void add(TreeNode treeNode){        if(root == null){            root = treeNode;        }else{            root.add(treeNode);        }    }    public TreeNode search(int data){        if(root == null){            return null;        }else{            return root.search(data);        }    }    public TreeNode parentSearch(int data){        if(root==null){            return null;        }else{            return root.searchParent(data);        }    }    public void delete(int data){        if(root==null) return;        else{            TreeNode target = this.search(data);            if(target==null){                return;            }            TreeNode parentNode = this.parentSearch(data);            if(target.getLeft()==null&&target.getRight()==null){                if(parentNode.getLeft().getData()==data){                    parentNode.setLeft(null);                }else{                    parentNode.setRight(null);                }            }            //删除两个节点            if(target.getLeft()!=null&&target.getRight()!=null){                TreeNode node = target.getRight();                int min = node.getData();                while(node.getLeft()!=null){                    node = node.getLeft();                    min = node.getData();                }                delete(min);                target.setData(min);            }            //删除只有子节点的节点            if(target.getLeft()==null&&target.getRight()!=null){                parentNode.setRight(target.getRight());            }else if(target.getLeft()!=null&&target.getRight()==null){                parentNode.setLeft(target.getLeft());            }        }    }    //遍历    public void preRoot(){        if(root!=null){            preRoot(root);        }    }    public void preRoot(TreeNode t){        if(t!=null){            System.out.println(t.getData());            preRoot(t.getLeft());            preRoot(t.getRight());        }    }    public void inRoot(){        if(root!= null){            inRoot(root);        }    }    public void inRoot(TreeNode t){        if(t!=null){            inRoot(t.getLeft());            System.out.println(t.getData());            inRoot(t.getRight());        }    }    public void postRoot(){        if(root!=null){            postRoot(root);        }    }    public void postRoot(TreeNode t){        if(t!=null){            postRoot(t.getLeft());            postRoot(t.getRight());            System.out.println(t.getData());        }    }}class TreeNode {    private int data;    private TreeNode left;    private TreeNode right;    public TreeNode(int data) {        this.data = data;    }    public TreeNode() {    }    public int getData() {        return data;    }    public void setData(int data) {        this.data = data;    }    public TreeNode getLeft() {        return left;    }    public void setLeft(TreeNode left) {        this.left = left;    }    public TreeNode getRight() {        return right;    }    public void setRight(TreeNode right) {        this.right = right;    }    public void add(TreeNode treeNode){        if(treeNode==null) return;        if(treeNode.data<=this.data){            if(this.left==null){                this.left=treeNode;            }else{                this.left.add(treeNode);            }        }else{            if(this.right==null){                this.right=treeNode;            }else{                this.right.add(treeNode);            }        }    }    public TreeNode search(int data){        if(data==this.data) {            return this;        }else if(data<this.data){            if(this.left==null){                return null;            }            return this.left.search(data);        } else{            if(this.right==null){                return null;            }            return this.right.search(data);        }    }    public TreeNode searchParent(int data){        if((this.left!=null&&this.left.data==data)||(this.right!=null&&this.right.data==data)){            return this;        }else if(data<this.data&&this.left!=null){            return this.left.searchParent(data);        }else if(data>this.data&&this.right!=null){            return this.right.searchParent(data);        }        return null;    }}

entry.title: 栈
entry.content:
一、栈概述

栈的插入删除只能在表的尾端进行，即后入先出，进行插入删除操作的位置是栈顶，另一段是栈底 插入称为入栈，删除称为出栈

二、栈的实现

  1. 顺序储存，数组实现
public class MyStack {    private Object[] objects;    private int top;      //栈顶指针    public MyStack(Object[] objects, int top) {        this.objects = objects;        this.top = top;    }    public MyStack() {        objects = new Object[10];        top = 0;    }    public MyStack(int i){        objects = new Object[i];        top = 0;    }     public int getLength(){        return top;    }    public void push(Object o) throws Exception {        if(this.objects.length==top){            throw new Exception("满了");        }        objects[top++] = o;    }    public Object pop() throws Exception {        if(top==0){            throw new Exception("空了");        }        return objects[--top];    }    public Object peak() throws Exception {        if(top!=0)         return objects[top-1];        throw new Exception("栈顶为空");    }    public void display(){        for(int i = top-1;i>=0;i--){            System.out.println(objects[i].toString());        }    }}

  1. 链式储存，链表实现

    public class MyStack2 {    private StackNode top;  //栈帧    public MyStack2(StackNode top) {        this.top = top;    }    public MyStack2() {    }    public int getLength(){        if(top==null) return 0;        StackNode n = top;        int i=0;        while(n.next!=null){            i++;            n=n.next;        }        return i;    }    public Object peak(){        if(top!=null){            return top.data;        }else            return null;    }    public void push(Object o){        StackNode stackNode = new StackNode(o);        stackNode.next = top;        top = stackNode;    }    public Object pop(){        if(top==null){            return null;        }else{            StackNode s = top;            top = top.next;            return s.data;        }    }    public void display(){        StackNode stackNode = top;        while(stackNode!=null){            System.out.println(stackNode.data.toString());            stackNode = stackNode.next;        }    }}class StackNode{    Object data;    StackNode next;    public StackNode(Object data) {        this.data = data;        this.next = null;    }       public StackNode() {    }}

entry.title: 操作系统
entry.content:
一、操作系统概述

二、进程和线程

  1. CPU的工作原理

    设置命令初值，pc=50，从地址总线获取内存中的命令，返回50命令到CPU中，执行命令

  2. 提出问题:IO指令的运算实际是计算指令的10^6倍，若先执行IO指令，则有数条指令在等待，CPU利用率过低

    解决方法：并发

  3. 进程的组织

    • PCB：为了描述控制进程的运行，系统中存放进程的管理和控制信息的数据结构称为进程控制块（PCB Process Control Block），它是进程实体的一部分，是操作系统中最重要的记录性数据结构。它是进程管理和控制的最重要的数据结构，每一个进程均有一个PCB，在创建进程时，建立PCB，伴随进程运行的全过程，直到进程撤消而撤消。

    • PCB+队列+状态组成了操作系统的组织，CPU将同一状态的PCB放进同一队列，根据不同的状态队列推进。


  4. 进程的交替

    schedule(){    //获得下一个要执行的进程    pNew = getNext(ReadyQuene);    //交换    switch_to(pCur,pNew)}

  5. 进程的地址空间分离

  6. 进程之间的合作

  7. 用户级线程

  8. 内核级线程及其实现

entry.title: 队列
entry.content:
一、概述

  1. 只允许在一端插入数据操作，在另一端进行删除数据操作的特殊线性表；进行插入操作的一端称为队尾（入队列），进行删除操作的一端称为队头（出队列）；队列具有先进先出（FIFO）的特性。

  2. 队列实现的关键在于两个指针，头指针指向已出队的元素，尾指针指向添加后的元素。

  3. 队列类型

    顺序队列

    循环队列

二、基本操作实现

  1. 顺序储存实现

    /** * 本次实现不考虑容量问题 * 基本操作： *  入队：enqueue() *  出队：dequeue() *  判断是否为空：isEmpty *  大小：size() *  返回队首元素不删除：peek() *  返回队尾元素不删除：poll() *  */public class MyQueue {    int front = -1;    int rear = -1;    private int size;    private Object[] elements = new Object[10];    public int enqueue(Object o) throws ArrayException{        if(rear>=elements.length){            throw new ArrayException("数组长度不足");        }        elements[++rear] = o;        size++;        return 1;    }    public Object dequeue() throws ArrayException{        if(isEmpty()){            front++;            size--;            return elements[front];        }else {            throw new ArrayException("队列已为空");        }    }    public boolean isEmpty() throws ArrayException{        return rear==front;    }    public Object peek() throws ArrayException {        if(isEmpty()){            return elements[front+1];        }else{            throw new ArrayException("队列为空");        }    }    public Object poll() throws ArrayException {        if(!isEmpty()){            return elements[rear];        }else {            throw new ArrayException("队列为空");        }    }}/** * 循环数组队列 * 两个指针： * 首指针指向首元素 * 尾指针指向尾元素的后一个元素 * 约定要留一个空档位置，即还剩余一个位置的时候就满。 * 当数组存满之后，向之前空档的位置填数据 *  rear = (rear+1)%array.length  得到新的位置 * 当 front == (rear+1)%array.length 时，队列满 * 当 rear== front 时，队列为空 */class CircleQueue{    int front = 0;    int rear = 0;    private int size;    private Object[] elements = new Object[10];    public int enqueue(Object o) throws ArrayException{        if(front == (rear+1)%elements.length){            throw new ArrayException("队列满");        }        elements[rear] = o;        rear = (rear+1)%elements.length;        size++;        return 1;    }    public Object dequeue() throws ArrayException{        if(!isEmpty()){            Object o = elements[front];            front=(front+1)%elements.length;            size--;            return o;        }else {            throw new ArrayException("队列已为空");        }    }    public boolean isEmpty() throws ArrayException{        return rear==front;    }    public Object peek() throws ArrayException {        if(isEmpty()){            return elements[front];        }else{            throw new ArrayException("队列为空");        }    }    public Object poll() throws ArrayException {        if(isEmpty()){            return elements[rear-1];        }else {            throw new ArrayException("队列为空");        }    }}

  2. 链式储存实现

entry.title: Hello hexo
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

entry.title: 线性表
entry.content:
一、线性表概述

1.线性表定义

  • ​ 线性表：n个同类型数据元素的有序序列 L=(a1,a2,a3,……..an)
  • ​ 除a1外，其他数据元素均有直接前驱
  • ​ 除an外，其他数据元素均有直接后驱

2.线性表的基本操作

  • ​ 建立线性表
  • ​ 清除线性表
  • ​ 定位线性表并查找前驱后继
  • ​ 查询
  • ​ 求线性表长度

3.线性表的存储结构及实现

  • 1.线性表的顺序储存及实现(数组)

    //java中的ArrayList类的内部实现是顺序储存线性表结构/*构造函数size()扩容函数增:add删：remove查：getcontain()*/public class ArrayList<E> extends AbstractList<E>        implements List<E>, RandomAccess, Cloneable, java.io.Serializable{    private static final long serialVersionUID = 8683452581122892189L;    //默认初始容量    private static final int DEFAULT_CAPACITY = 10;    private static final Object[] EMPTY_ELEMENTDATA = {};    private static final Object[] DEFAULTCAPACITY_EMPTY_ELEMENTDATA = {};    /*transient关键字，添加transient关键字的属性避免被序列化*/    transient Object[] elementData;     private int size;//构造函数    public ArrayList(int initialCapacity) {        if (initialCapacity > 0) {            this.elementData = new Object[initialCapacity];        } else if (initialCapacity == 0) {            this.elementData = EMPTY_ELEMENTDATA;        } else {            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Illegal Capacity: "+                                               initialCapacity);        }    }    public ArrayList() {        this.elementData = DEFAULTCAPACITY_EMPTY_ELEMENTDATA;    }/*数组扩容1.扩大原来容量的一半2.copyof 复制*/    private void grow(int minCapacity) {        // overflow-conscious code        int oldCapacity = elementData.length;        int newCapacity = oldCapacity + (oldCapacity >> 1);//扩大原容量的一半        if (newCapacity - minCapacity < 0)            newCapacity = minCapacity;        if (newCapacity - MAX_ARRAY_SIZE > 0)  //扩容至 Integer.MAX_VALUE            newCapacity = hugeCapacity(minCapacity);        // minCapacity is usually close to size, so this is a win://复制数组        elementData = Arrays.copyOf(elementData, newCapacity);    }    public int size() {        return size;    }    public boolean isEmpty() {        return size == 0;    }    public boolean contains(Object o) {        return indexOf(o) >= 0;    }    //查//返回某元素第一次出现的下标(可以为null)    public int indexOf(Object o) {        if (o == null) {            for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)                if (elementData[i]==null)                    return i;        } else {            for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)                if (o.equals(elementData[i]))                    return i;        }        return -1;    }//返回某元素最后一次出现的下标    public int lastIndexOf(Object o) {        if (o == null) {            for (int i = size-1; i >= 0; i--)                if (elementData[i]==null)                    return i;        } else {            for (int i = size-1; i >= 0; i--)                if (o.equals(elementData[i]))                    return i;        }        return -1;    }//获取某下标的元素    public E get(int index) {        rangeCheck(index);//检查下标        return elementData(index);    }    /**     * Replaces the element at the specified position in this list with     * the specified element.     *     * @param index index of the element to replace     * @param element element to be stored at the specified position     * @return the element previously at the specified position     * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException {@inheritDoc}     *///修改某下标的元素，并返回原值    public E set(int index, E element) {        rangeCheck(index);//检查下标        E oldValue = elementData(index);        elementData[index] = element;        return oldValue;    }//增//添加元素    public boolean add(E e) {        ensureCapacityInternal(size + 1);  // Increments modCount!!  //扩容判断        elementData[size++] = e;        return true;    }//在特定下标插入值    public void add(int index, E element) {        rangeCheckForAdd(index); //下标范围判断        ensureCapacityInternal(size + 1);  // Increments modCount!!  //扩容判断//底层调用C/C++ （原始数组，开始下标，目标数组，开始位置，复制个数）        System.arraycopy(elementData, index, elementData, index + 1,                         size - index); //将index及后的元素复制到index+1之后        elementData[index] = element;        size++;    }//删//删除某下标的元素/*将删除的元素之后的数据整体前移将前移的元素空位的值改为null*/    public E remove(int index) {        rangeCheck(index);        modCount++;        E oldValue = elementData(index);        int numMoved = size - index - 1;        if (numMoved > 0)//将删除下标后的元素整体前移            System.arraycopy(elementData, index+1, elementData, index,                             numMoved);        elementData[--size] = null; // clear to let GC do its work        return oldValue;    }//删除某个元素//遍历    public boolean remove(Object o) {        if (o == null) {            for (int index = 0; index < size; index++)                if (elementData[index] == null) {                    fastRemove(index);                    return true;                }        } else {            for (int index = 0; index < size; index++)                if (o.equals(elementData[index])) {                    fastRemove(index);                    return true;                }        }        return false;    }//清空整个列表    public void clear() {        modCount++;        // clear to let GC do its work        for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)            elementData[i] = null;        size = 0;    } }

    ​

  • 2.线性表的链式储存及实现(链表)

    public class LinkedList<E>    extends AbstractSequentialList<E>    implements List<E>, Deque<E>, Cloneable, java.io.Serializable {    transient int size = 0;        transient Node<E> first;    transient Node<E> last;    public LinkedList() {    }    public LinkedList(Collection<? extends E> c) {        this();        addAll(c);    }//作为首节点连接    private void linkFirst(E e) {        final Node<E> f = first;        final Node<E> newNode = new Node<>(null, e, f);        first = newNode;        if (f == null)            last = newNode;        else            f.prev = newNode;        size++;        modCount++;    }//作为末节点连接    void linkLast(E e) {        final Node<E> l = last;        final Node<E> newNode = new Node<>(l, e, null);        last = newNode;        if (l == null)            first = newNode;        else            l.next = newNode;        size++;        modCount++;    }//将数据e插入到Node succ 的位置上    void linkBefore(E e, Node<E> succ) {        // assert succ != null;//创建一个新的节点，包含e //新节点的prev 为原节点的prev ，新节点的next 为原节点//原节点的prev 变为新节点//原节点的prev 的 next 变为新节点        final Node<E> pred = succ.prev;        final Node<E> newNode = new Node<>(pred, e, succ);        succ.prev = newNode;        if (pred == null)            first = newNode;        else            pred.next = newNode;        size++;        modCount++;    }//断开第一个节点与链表的连接    private E unlinkFirst(Node<E> f) {        // assert f == first && f != null;        final E element = f.item;        final Node<E> next = f.next;        f.item = null;        f.next = null; // help GC        first = next;        if (next == null)            last = null;        else            next.prev = null;        size--;        modCount++;        return element;    }//断开和最后一个节点的连接    private E unlinkLast(Node<E> l) {        // assert l == last && l != null;        final E element = l.item;        final Node<E> prev = l.prev;        l.item = null;        l.prev = null; // help GC        last = prev;        if (prev == null)            first = null;        else            prev.next = null;        size--;        modCount++;        return element;    }//断开某节点连接    E unlink(Node<E> x) {        // assert x != null;        final E element = x.item;        final Node<E> next = x.next;        final Node<E> prev = x.prev;        if (prev == null) {            first = next;        } else {            prev.next = next;            x.prev = null;        }        if (next == null) {            last = prev;        } else {            next.prev = prev;            x.next = null;        }        x.item = null;        size--;        modCount++;        return element;    }//获得第一个及节点数据    public E getFirst() {        final Node<E> f = first;        if (f == null)            throw new NoSuchElementException();        return f.item;    }    /**     * Returns the last element in this list.     *     * @return the last element in this list     * @throws NoSuchElementException if this list is empty     *///获得最后一个节点数据    public E getLast() {        final Node<E> l = last;        if (l == null)            throw new NoSuchElementException();        return l.item;    }//删除第一个节点，首节点不能为空    public E removeFirst() {        final Node<E> f = first;        if (f == null)            throw new NoSuchElementException();        return unlinkFirst(f);    }    /**     * Removes and returns the last element from this list.     *     * @return the last element from this list     * @throws NoSuchElementException if this list is empty     *///删除最后一个节点，末节点不能为空    public E removeLast() {        final Node<E> l = last;        if (l == null)            throw new NoSuchElementException();        return unlinkLast(l);    }//将节点设为首节点    public void addFirst(E e) {        linkFirst(e);    }//将节点设为末节点    public void addLast(E e) {        linkLast(e);    }    /**     * Returns {@code true} if this list contains the specified element.     * More formally, returns {@code true} if and only if this list contains     * at least one element {@code e} such that     * <tt>(o==null ? e==null : o.equals(e))</tt>.     *     * @param o element whose presence in this list is to be tested     * @return {@code true} if this list contains the specified element     */    public boolean contains(Object o) {        return indexOf(o) != -1;    }    public int size() {        return size;    }//添加元素    public boolean add(E e) {        linkLast(e);        return true;    }//删除某元素    public boolean remove(Object o) {        if (o == null) {            for (Node<E> x = first; x != null; x = x.next) {                if (x.item == null) {                    unlink(x);  //找到元素，并断开连接                    return true;                }            }        } else {            for (Node<E> x = first; x != null; x = x.next) {                if (o.equals(x.item)) {                    unlink(x);                    return true;                }            }        }        return false;    }    public boolean addAll(Collection<? extends E> c) {        return addAll(size, c);    }    //删除所有数据    public void clear() {        //   Clearing all of the links between nodes is "unnecessary", but:        // - helps a generational GC if the discarded nodes inhabit        //   more than one generation        // - is sure to free memory even if there is a reachable Iterator        for (Node<E> x = first; x != null; ) {            Node<E> next = x.next;            x.item = null;            x.next = null;            x.prev = null;            x = next;        }        first = last = null;        size = 0;        modCount++;    }    // Positional Access Operations    /**     * Returns the element at the specified position in this list.     *     * @param index index of the element to return     * @return the element at the specified position in this list     * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException {@inheritDoc}     */    public E get(int index) {        checkElementIndex(index);//检查下标//node(index） 获得特定下标的节点        return node(index).item;    }//修改特定下标的节点的值    public E set(int index, E element) {        checkElementIndex(index);//检查下标        Node<E> x = node(index);        E oldVal = x.item;        x.item = element;        return oldVal;    }   //在特定的位置插入节点    public void add(int index, E element) {        checkPositionIndex(index); //检查下标        if (index == size)            linkLast(element);  //直接添加，作为最后一个节点连接        else            linkBefore(element, node(index));  //将节点插入到列表中    }   //删除特定下标的节点    public E remove(int index) {        checkElementIndex(index);  //检查下标        return unlink(node(index)); //断开某节点的连接    }    /**     * Tells if the argument is the index of an existing element.     *///判断下标    private boolean isElementIndex(int index) {        return index >= 0 && index < size;    }//判断下标    private boolean isPositionIndex(int index) {        return index >= 0 && index <= size;    }//检查下标    private void checkElementIndex(int index) {        if (!isElementIndex(index))            throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException(outOfBoundsMsg(index));    }    private void checkPositionIndex(int index) {        if (!isPositionIndex(index))            throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException(outOfBoundsMsg(index));    }//获得特定下标的节点    Node<E> node(int index) {        // assert isElementIndex(index);        //采用二分法，循环        if (index < (size >> 1)) {            Node<E> x = first;            for (int i = 0; i < index; i++)                x = x.next;            return x;        } else {            Node<E> x = last;            for (int i = size - 1; i > index; i--)                x = x.prev;            return x;        }    }    // Search Operations//获得某元素第一次出现的下标    public int indexOf(Object o) {        int index = 0;//循环遍历        if (o == null) {            for (Node<E> x = first; x != null; x = x.next) {                if (x.item == null)                    return index;                index++;            }        } else {            for (Node<E> x = first; x != null; x = x.next) {                if (o.equals(x.item))                    return index;                index++;            }        }        return -1;    }//获取某元素最后一次出现的下标    public int lastIndexOf(Object o) {//从last节点向前遍历        int index = size;        if (o == null) {            for (Node<E> x = last; x != null; x = x.prev) {                index--;                if (x.item == null)                    return index;            }        } else {             for (Node<E> x = last; x != null; x = x.prev) {                index--;                if (o.equals(x.item))                    return index;            }        }        return -1;    }    // Queue operations. linkedList的队列操作/*peak：获得首节点数据，如果首节点是null，则返回null，只返回值不删除节点element：返回首节点数据，首节点为null则异常remove：删除首节点，首节点可以为nullpoll：删除首节点，首节点可以为nulladd：可以增加null元素offer：可以增加null元素*///获得首节点数据，如果是null，则返回null，只返回值不删除节点    public E peek() {        final Node<E> f = first;        return (f == null) ? null : f.item;    }//返回首节点数据，首节点为null则异常    public E element() {        return getFirst();    }//删除首节点，首节点可以为null    public E poll() {        final Node<E> f = first;        return (f == null) ? null : unlinkFirst(f);    }//删除第一个节点，且首节点不为空    public E remove() {        return removeFirst();    }    public boolean offer(E e) {        return add(e);    }        /**     * Inserts the specified element at the end of this list.     *     * @param e the element to insert     * @return {@code true} (as specified by {@link Deque#offerLast})     * @since 1.6     */    public boolean offerLast(E e) {        addLast(e);        return true;    }    /**     * Retrieves, but does not remove, the first element of this list,     * or returns {@code null} if this list is empty.     *     * @return the first element of this list, or {@code null}     *         if this list is empty     * @since 1.6     */    public E peekFirst() {        final Node<E> f = first;        return (f == null) ? null : f.item;     }    /**     * Retrieves, but does not remove, the last element of this list,     * or returns {@code null} if this list is empty.     *     * @return the last element of this list, or {@code null}     *         if this list is empty     * @since 1.6     */    public E peekLast() {        final Node<E> l = last;        return (l == null) ? null : l.item;    }    /**     * Retrieves and removes the first element of this list,     * r returns {@code null} if this list is empty.     *     * @return the first element of this list, or {@code null} if     *     this list is empty     * @since 1.6     */    public E pollFirst() {        final Node<E> f = first;        return (f == null) ? null : unlinkFirst(f);    }    /**     * Retrieves and removes the last element of this list,     * or returns {@code null} if this list is empty.     *     * @return the last element of this list, or {@code null} if     *     this list is empty     * @since 1.6     */    public E pollLast() {        final Node<E> l = last;        return (l == null) ? null : unlinkLast(l);    }    /**     * Pushes an element onto the stack represented by this list.  In other     * words, inserts the element at the front of this list.     *     * <p>This method is equivalent to {@link #addFirst}.     *     * @param e the element to push     * @since 1.6     *//*linkedlist中 有关于栈的操作   pop:   */    public void push(E e) {        addFirst(e);    }    /**     * Pops an element from the stack represented by this list.  In other     * words, removes and returns the first element of this list.     *     * <p>This method is equivalent to {@link #removeFirst()}.     *     * @return the element at the front of this list (which is the top     *         of the stack represented by this list)     * @throws NoSuchElementException if this list is empty     * @since 1.6     *///出栈，首节点不能为空    public E pop() {        return removeFirst();    }    /**     * Removes the first occurrence of the specified element in this     * list (when traversing the list from head to tail).  If the list     * does not contain the element, it is unchanged.     *     * @param o element to be removed from this list, if present     * @return {@code true} if the list contained the specified element     * @since 1.6     */    public boolean removeFirstOccurrence(Object o) {        return remove(o);    }    /**     * Removes the last occurrence of the specified element in this     * list (when traversing the list from head to tail).  If the list     * does not contain the element, it is unchanged.     *     * @param o element to be removed from this list, if present     * @return {@code true} if the list contained the specified element     * @since 1.6     */    public boolean removeLastOccurrence(Object o) {        if (o == null) {            for (Node<E> x = last; x != null; x = x.prev) {                if (x.item == null) {                    unlink(x);                    return true;                }            }        } else {            for (Node<E> x = last; x != null; x = x.prev) {                if (o.equals(x.item)) {                    unlink(x);                    return true;                }            }        }        return false;    }    /**     * Returns a list-iterator of the elements in this list (in proper     * sequence), starting at the specified position in the list.     * Obeys the general contract of {@code List.listIterator(int)}.<p>     *     * The list-iterator is <i>fail-fast</i>: if the list is structurally     * modified at any time after the Iterator is created, in any way except     * through the list-iterator's own {@code remove} or {@code add}     * methods, the list-iterator will throw a     * {@code ConcurrentModificationException}.  Thus, in the face of     * concurrent modification, the iterator fails quickly and cleanly, rather     * than risking arbitrary, non-deterministic behavior at an undetermined     * time in the future.     *     * @param index index of the first element to be returned from the     *              list-iterator (by a call to {@code next})     * @return a ListIterator of the elements in this list (in proper     *         sequence), starting at the specified position in the list     * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException {@inheritDoc}     * @see List#listIterator(int)     */    public ListIterator<E> listIterator(int index) {        checkPositionIndex(index);        return new ListItr(index);    }    private class ListItr implements ListIterator<E> {        private Node<E> lastReturned;        private Node<E> next;        private int nextIndex;        private int expectedModCount = modCount;        ListItr(int index) {            // assert isPositionIndex(index);            next = (index == size) ? null : node(index);            nextIndex = index;        }        public boolean hasNext() {            return nextIndex < size;        }        public E next() {            checkForComodification();            if (!hasNext())                throw new NoSuchElementException();            lastReturned = next;            next = next.next;            nextIndex++;            return lastReturned.item;        }        public boolean hasPrevious() {            return nextIndex > 0;        }        public E previous() {            checkForComodification();            if (!hasPrevious())                throw new NoSuchElementException();            lastReturned = next = (next == null) ? last : next.prev;            nextIndex--;            return lastReturned.item;        }        public int nextIndex() {            return nextIndex;        }        public int previousIndex() {            return nextIndex - 1;        }        public void remove() {            checkForComodification();            if (lastReturned == null)                throw new IllegalStateException();            Node<E> lastNext = lastReturned.next;            unlink(lastReturned);            if (next == lastReturned)                next = lastNext;            else                nextIndex--;            lastReturned = null;            expectedModCount++;        }        public void set(E e) {            if (lastReturned == null)                throw new IllegalStateException();            checkForComodification();            lastReturned.item = e;        }        public void add(E e) {            checkForComodification();            lastReturned = null;            if (next == null)                linkLast(e);            else                linkBefore(e, next);            nextIndex++;            expectedModCount++;        }        public void forEachRemaining(Consumer<? super E> action) {            Objects.requireNonNull(action);            while (modCount == expectedModCount && nextIndex < size) {                action.accept(next.item);                lastReturned = next;                next = next.next;                nextIndex++;            }            checkForComodification();        }        final void checkForComodification() {            if (modCount != expectedModCount)                throw new ConcurrentModificationException();        }    }//链表节点    private static class Node<E> {        E item; //元素         Node<E> next;  //上一个        Node<E> prev;  //下一个        Node(Node<E> prev, E element, Node<E> next) {            this.item = element;            this.next = next;            this.prev = prev;        }    }}

entry.title: Http协议
entry.content:
一、http概述

  1. http协议用于客户端和服务端之间的通信，其中请求文本和图像资源的是客户端，提供资源和响应资源的是服务端。客户端和服务端对象在通信过程中可能会交换。
  2. URL和URI

二、报文

  1. 请求报文

    请求报文由 方法、URI、协议版本、请求首部字段(前几项共同组成报文首部)内容实体组成。

    • 方法

      GET:获取资源(客户端说：请把资源给我)

      POST：传输实体主体(客户端说：我要把信息告诉你)

      PUT：传输文件

      HEAD：获得报文首部

      DELETE：删除文件

      OPTIONS：询问支持的方法

      TRACE：追踪路径

      CONNECT：要求用隧道协议连接处理

  2. 响应报文

    响应报文由协议版本、状态码、状态码原因短语、响应首部字段组成。

  3. 请求行和状态行

    请求行：包含请求的方法和版本。

    状态行：包含状态码和原因短语。

三、状态码

  1. 1xx(信息状态码)

    接受的信息正在处理

  2. 2xx(成功状态码)

    200 ok

    204 请求成功但无资源返回

    206 请求资源的一部分

  3. 3xx(重定向状态码)

    301 永久重定向

    302 临时重定向

    304 资源找到到请求不符合要求

    307 临时重定向

  4. 4xx(客户端错误码)

    401 http认证失败

    403 访问资源不允许访问

    404 页面找不到

  5. 5xx(服务端状态码)

    500 资源出现问题

    503 服务器正忙

四、常用首部字段

  • 请求首部字段

    Accept：用户代理可处理的媒体类型

    Accept-Charset：优先的字符集

    Accept-Encoding：优先的内容编码

    Accept-Language：优先的语言（自然语言）

    Authorization：Web认证信息

    Expect：期待服务器的特定行为

    From：用户的电子邮箱地址

    Host：请求资源所在服务器

    If-Match：比较实体标记（ETag）

    If-Modified-Since：比较资源的更新时间

    If-None-Match：比较实体标记（与If-Match相反）

    If-Range：资源未更新时发送实体Byte的范围请求

    If-Unmodified-Since：比较资源的更新时间（与If-Modified-Since相反）

    Max-Forwards：最大传输逐跳数

    Proxy-Authorization：代理服务器要求客户端的认真信息

    Range：实体的直接范围请求

    Referer：对请求中URI的原始获取方

    TE：传输编码的优先级

    User-Agent：HTTP客户端程序的信息

  • 响应首部字段

    Accept-Ranges：是否接受字节范围请求

    Age：推算资源创建经过时间

    ETa：资源的匹配信息

    Location：令客户端重定向至指定URI

    Proxy-Authenticate：代理服务器对客户端的认真信息

    Retry-After：对再次发起请求的时机请求

    Server：HTTP服务器的安装信息

    Vary：代理服务器缓存的管理信息

    WWW-Authenticate：服务器对客户端的认真信息

  • 通用字段

    Cache-Control：控制缓存的行为

    Connection：逐跳首部、管理持久连接。不再转发的首部字段名。

    Date：创建报文的日期时间

    Pragma：报文指令

    Trailer：报文末端的首部一览

    Transfer-Encoding：指定报文主体的传输编码方式

    Upgrade：升级为其他协议

    Via：代理服务器的相关信息

    Warning：错误通知
